feedback.fit: The slim fit t-shirt and shorts create a youthful silhouette that suits your frame well.
feedback.color: The green striped shirt pairs nicely with the black and white floral shorts for a cohesive casual look.
feedback.footwear: The brown leather sandals are a great choice to complete the relaxed summer outfit.
feedback.accessories: No accessories needed - the outfit speaks for itself with the bold prints.
feedback.style: This is a stylish casual summer look that's perfect for a day out with friends or running errands.

feedback.fit: The loose fit of the shirt balances the fitted denim shorts. Rolling the sleeves would elevate the look.
feedback.color: The white shirt and light wash denim create a clean, fresh palette for summer.
feedback.footwear: The black wedges dress up the casual outfit while still being comfortable for walking.
feedback.accessories: The black bag and sunglasses are chic additions that polish off the relaxed style.
feedback.style: Overall this is a put-together casual look, but a half-tuck of the shirt could take it up a notch.

feedback.fit: The loose fit of the top with the short skirt creates an unbalanced silhouette. Tucking in the shirt a bit could help.
feedback.color: The red stripes pop nicely against the black skirt, but the yellow scarf clashes a bit with the palette.
feedback.footwear: The black pumps lengthen the legs but seem a touch too formal for the overall outfit.
feedback.accessories: The scarf color doesn't quite coordinate with the rest of the look. A neutral tone would be better.
feedback.style: There are nice elements of Parisian style here, but the proportions and accessories could use some refining.

feedback.fit: The fitted denim vest and shorts hug your curves and create an attractive silhouette.
feedback.color: The mix of light and royal blue denim pieces work well together for a coordinated casual look.
feedback.footwear: The black ankle boots add an edgy vibe that pairs perfectly with the distressed denim.
feedback.accessories: The black watch is a nice subtle accessory that doesn't distract from the outfit.
feedback.style: This casual look has a great rocker edge to it. The pieces are simple but make a bold statement together.

feedback.fit: The flowy sundress drapes beautifully and the lightweight cardigan provides nice coverage without bulk.
feedback.color: The crisp white cardigan makes the green dress pop. It's a fresh, natural color palette.
feedback.footwear: The brown wedge sandals elongate your legs while complementing the bohemian style.
feedback.accessories: The outfit is strong on its own without accessories. The simplicity allows the dress to shine.
feedback.style: This look embodies effortless feminine bohemian style. It's perfect for a summer day event.

feedback.fit: The fitted off-the-shoulder sweater shows off your neckline and the tights hug your legs to create a sleek look.
feedback.color: The bold fuchsia contrasts nicely with the gray tights, but the red bag is a bit of a clash with the pink tone.
feedback.footwear: The black ankle boots ground the outfit and add a touch of edge to the feminine sweater.
feedback.accessories: A different colored bag, like black or metallic, would coordinate better with the outfit.
feedback.style: This look makes a bold, trendy statement with the off-the-shoulder silhouette and pop of bright color.

feedback.fit: The loose fit of the blouse paired with the tight jeans creates an unbalanced silhouette. Tucking in the top would improve the proportions.
feedback.color: The blue floral print is pretty against the white background, but the red bag doesn't coordinate well with the color scheme.
feedback.footwear: The brown wedges work nicely with the outfit's casual vibe and palette.
feedback.accessories: A blue or green bag would tie in better with the floral colors than the bold red.
feedback.style: This outfit has potential as a cute casual look, but could be elevated with some tweaks to fit and accessories.

feedback.fit: The loose, long t-shirt overwhelms your figure when paired with the loose shorts. Tucking or tying the shirt would create a more flattering silhouette.
feedback.color: The gray and blue color palette is okay but a bit dull. The outfit could use a small pop of color.
feedback.footwear: The tan wedges are nice for a casual look but seem slightly disconnected from the rest of the outfit.
feedback.accessories: The white tote is very large and distracting. A smaller bag in a coordinating color would be better.
feedback.style: There are preppy elements here with the plaid and tote, but the overall outfit lacks polish in the fit and color departments.

feedback.fit: The slim fit of the cardigan and chinos creates a polished, tailored silhouette that flatters your figure.
feedback.color: The navy and white stripes pair perfectly with the neutral khaki for a classic preppy color combo.
feedback.footwear: The brown leather sandals pick up the warm tones of the khakis and add a casual touch.
feedback.accessories: The brown leather bag is an excellent coordinating accessory that enhances the put-together style.
feedback.style: This look nails preppy chic style with the crisp basics and carefully coordinated color palette. Great for many occasions.

feedback.fit: The relaxed fit of the shorts with the loose shirt creates an effortlessly casual look that suits you.
feedback.color: The white and gray neutrals are clean and work well together, but the outfit could use one more color to liven it up a bit.
feedback.footwear: The tan sandals are the perfect simple and comfortable choice for this minimalist outfit.
feedback.accessories: The brown bag and sunglasses enhance the easy, fuss-free style. A long pendant necklace could be a nice addition.
feedback.style: This is a great example of casual minimalist style, with uncomplicated pieces in a neutral palette. Very versatile for summer weekends.
